<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Directional Bombs](/Feats.aspx?ID=5779) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 66 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Demolitionist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=118) (Level 8)

</column>

---

You can lob bombs with great force and a precise trajectory to angle the splash in a cone that sprays in a single direction, potentially allowing you to avoid allies and splash deeper into enemy lines. When throwing an [alchemical bomb](/Equipment.aspx?Category=6&Subcategory=7) with the [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=699) trait, instead of splashing all squares adjacent to the target, you can create a splash in a 15-foot cone. You choose the cone's direction, but its first square must be a square in the target's space.

**Special** If you have the [Expanded Splash](/Feats.aspx?ID=109) feat or another ability that increases the radius of splash damage, you can have the splash damage be a 20-foot cone.
name: Directional Bombs
